title: Time & the Great Reset | Guests: Justin Haskins & Andrew McCarthy | 10/26/20
description:
Just over a week from the election, Joe Biden has put another lid on his campaign and claimed the Hunter Biden story is Russian disinformation. Glenn literally got on the Trump Train. Justin Haskins, co-author of Glenn’s upcoming book on the Great Reset, joins to discuss how Time magazine’s newest edition proves the Left’s excitement for ending capitalism. Could Bernie Sanders be Joe Biden’s labor secretary? The Senate will likely confirm Amy Coney Barrett to the Supreme Court tonight. National Review’s Andrew McCarthy addresses how reliable the Hunter Biden emails are. With two versions of Trump’s "60 Minutes" interview, can we see the media’s bias? Jason Buttrill gives the latest on Hunter Biden and the intelligence community.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
